name: Chess Deluxe!!
description:
Chess Deluxe!! - professional, luxury design chess game that you can play with your friends or against challenging computer opponent.

Features:
* Exclusive user interface and great sound effects
* Single player and two players game - play with your friends or against artificial intelligence engine
* 8 levels of difficulty
* Unlimited move undo function that allows you multiple retries and workout of your game standing
* Special moves like promotion, castling, en passant are included and not forgotten
* Automatic save when you exit game or receive a phone call
* iPhone, iPad and iPod touch support
* Portrait and also landscape mode for your convenience
* No Ads

The game uses modified version of exclusive Amy Chess Engine originally developed by Thorsten Greiner.
